text: Music.

I'm at a restaurant called Invitation V and
it's a vegan restaurant and also gluten-free

options and I got the mushroom burger and
instead of the bun that has gluten in it, I
got this like corn patty, smells amazing.

Look at these fries, oh yeah, gonna dip it
in my vegan mayo... oh my god!
Holy shit!

The gyp [?] one of - definitely is one of
the best fries I've ever had.

It's crunchy, so crunchy on the outside and
like mushy delicious potato on the inside

and almost in their fries, I'm so glad, I
am.
I got some vegan mayo and ketchup.

I've never had a corn burger bun and it's

an option of the restaurant, so it's just

or a lettuce wrap, this is great.

That is a meaty patty, salt, pepper.

The shiitake, very flavorful.

And you got some caramelized onions and pesto
lettuce tomato... it's so good.
Wow!

This may be one of the best vegan burgers

like that's a bold statement right, cuz I've

I'm at a place called Liv Salads and... what
a salad!

This bowl is full of life, this bowl smells
so fresh.

It's about the lime and the parsley and the
avocado.

There's nothing better than eating something
that tastes so damn good you know that is

It's got a mixture of kale and romaine lettuce,

it's like a lime dressing, it's got radish
in here as well, Tostitos, chips.

Gives it that nice crunch too, it's really
good.
Oh, and fresh mango.

Now this place does salads, that's what they
do.

They have a couple of Buddha bowls as well

This one here is supposed to be one of their

OK, so I'm at a place called Sushi Momo and
they make only vegan sushi and there's a massive
menu, yeah.

It has truffle oil, a bunch of different mushrooms,
oyster, shiitake, that was the one.

And then the other one has jackfruit on it,
which is so big, that was it.
So back to this one again.

It has like these Japanese rice krispies around
it, so it gives it that crunch and it's damn good.
Oh my god!

It's seared, so it's got like that smoky flavor
and I can taste the truffle oil.

That was just the top of it too, I didn't
even like diggin.
Try this part.
Oh my god!
This Sushi's unbelievable!

There's so many different flavors and textures,
I can definitely taste the meatiness of the

jackfruit, there's some tempura around it,
around is seaweed, so there's that crunchiness

as well, kentup [?] spice to it which is really

OK, so I'm sitting in the restaurant, all
by myself because I'm here solo and pretty

much crying, like teary because the food is

So, I'm at a vegetarian restaurant called
Lola Rosa, there's three locations in Montreal.

They can do a lot with the menu and they are
vegan and gluten free.

I got a Curry here and they make their own curry
here and it's vegan, gluten free, this is
like a corn tortilla.

We've got sweet potato here, chickpeas, looks

some orange, parsley on top.
This is like a peach or mango.
Wow, that's spicy!
Same with them all, It tastes good and health.
Sweety, it's sweet and spicy.

I'd say it's more like a Thai curry than an
Indian curry.

I can't figure out what kind of chutney is
this but it's like cold and sweet; bounces
up the spiciness of the curry.

I am at a restaurant recommended several times
but you guys, called Lov.

It's still mid days, this place is packed, absolutely
packed, there're no seats anywhere except
these swings.

So, when I came in, the lady said "did you
make a reservation?" and I said no, thinking
of flap, how can I get in?

She was like "well, all we have are these
swings in the back", like it was a bad thing

and I'm like, "Umm, yeah I'll take one of
those".

I got my own little table, superfection, I
can just like swing here, everyone else gotta
sit on a normal chair.

I got the vegan Gnocchi made with buckwheat

Gluten free baby!
I'm vegan.
So wow.
I may be loving the hemp pesto.

Texture of the gnocchi, just like regular

The texture is like - oh my god, chuff [?] mashed

I'm really diggin the hemp, you can taste

You can taste the hemp if you've ever had
